name: Luke's Bionic Hand
Lore: 'Uses state-of-the-art digital processors. Although Luke had lost his hand, the Alliance could rebuild it. They had the technology. They could make it better, stronger, faster.',
Text: 'Deploy on Luke. Luke''s power and immunity to attrition are +2. During battle at a battleground, may exchange a card in hand with an Interrupt in Lost Pile. This device lost if Luke Disarmed.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
